meanings.definition: Resembling gneiss in appearance or composition.
meanings.sent1: The gneissoid rocks in the area had similar patterns to gneiss.
meanings.sent2: The mountain had a gneissoid look, with layers of different colors.
meanings.sent3: The gneissoid boulder looked like a giant puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed like a gneissoid river of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The gneissoid texture of the wall made it easy to climb.

meanings.sent1: The soil in the garden was gneissoid, perfect for growing vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The gneissoid structure of the building made it sturdy and durable.
meanings.sent3: The gneissoid cat had a fur pattern that resembled a rocky landscape.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a gneissoid quality, deep and resonant.
meanings.sent5: The gneissoid appearance of the cake made it look like a delicious rock formation.

meanings.sent1: The gneissoid cliffs towered above the valley, majestic and imposing.
meanings.sent2: The gneissoid layers in the rock formation were clearly visible.
meanings.sent3: The gneissoid clouds in the sky looked like fluffy boulders.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a gneissoid sparkle, reflecting the light like polished stone.
meanings.sent5: The gneissoid pattern on the floor tiles added a touch of elegance to the room.
